Attribute.Name: AwaitingChargeInterfaceAmount
Attribute.Description: Awaiting authorization amount on this payment method.

Description.div: The funds available to be charged on this payment method as determined by the GetFundsAvailable user exit, if it was invoked.
Indicates if the GetFundsAvailable user exit was invoked for this payment method.

Attribute.Name: SuspendAnyMoreCharges
Attribute.Description: Flag to indicate more charging has to be suspended.

Attribute.Name: IsValid
Attribute.Description: This attribute indicates whether credit card validation was successful. The client checks the value of this attribute. If it is Y, the credit card is considered as valid and the client does not perform any additional validation. If it is N, the credit card is considered as invalid, the client does not perform any additional validation and displays an error on the screen. If it is blank, it is assumed that the credit card was not validated and the client performs its out of the box validation.

Attribute.Name: Message
Attribute.Description: This attribute will have error messages in case the validation fails.
